thread.title: Ground News - Summit Nordic fights nasty weather en route to first wins of the season
thread.title_full: Ground News - Summit Nordic fights nasty weather en route to first wins of the season

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Summit Nordic fights nasty weather en route to first wins of the season
text: Summit Nordic fights nasty weather en route to first wins of the season With wind gusts up to 50 mph and intermittent snow showers, being outside for even the shortest span of time was not only freezing, but also miserable. Those who saw the weather throughout the day on Friday, Jan. 12, in and around Summit County were probably inclined to stay inside at all costs. Summary by Ground News 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right [] summitdaily.com Summit Nordic fights nasty weather en route to first wins of the season James Sowers rockets his way to an individual state championship in the boys skate race at the 2023 state skiing championships in Frisco on Thursday, Feb. 16. Cody Jones/Summit Daily News Those who saw the weather throughout the day on Friday, Jan. 12, in and around Summit County were probably inclined to stay inside at all costs.
